summary: A father gets into a desperate search to find his children who disappeared while going down stairs from their apartment in the seventh floor.
cast: Ricardo Darín|Belén Rueda|Abel Dolz Doval|Charo Dolz Doval|Luis Ziembrowski|Osvaldo Santoro|Guillermo Arengo|Jorge D'Elía|Carolina Barbosa|Pedro Angel Di Salvia|Patricia Gilmour|Gaby Ferrero|Dora Fajn|Gabriel Araoz|Elsa Barrera|Gervasio Usaj|Angeles Olgiati|Dalila Romero|Héctor Sinder|Javier López Barreira|Blanca Formáriz|Ana Clara Bergamo|Alumine Cabrera|Claudio Rojas|Marinha Villalobos|Juan Andrés Casella Kem|Maria Lucia Casella Kem|Andrea Carballo|Damian Merwicer|Juliana Muras|María Silvina Lamorte|Nicolas Plager|Mucio Manchini|Horacio Savanz|Florencia Limonoff
title: Séptimo
